780950.name: Garenburg Woods: Happy Art Collection
780950.description:
Garenburg Woods: Happy Art Collection is a collection of art and images from Garenburg Woods.

The following art collection contains:

  • Most art assets used in the game, such as characters, sprites, and more

  • Higher quality images of some enemies and scenes

  • Scrapped enemy designs and high quality artwork of them

  • A bunch of other various art and the like that didn't make it into the game

To find the artbook, please open the game files folder.

  • In Steam, go to the "Library" tab

  • Locate Gareburg Woods in your library

  • Right click the game, and select the "Properties" tab

  • Select the "Local Files" tab and click on the "Browse Local Files" button

  • The artwork will be in the "Happy Art Collection" folder. Open with anything that can open the PNG file format.
